landing.description: Easy to use and aesthetically pleasing email client, coming soon!

vision.title: Reading mail should be enjoyable
text:
Browsing content.
That's what you do while using your social media apps like Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Reddit, etc. You browse content.
Reading email should be about consuming and enjoying the content that they provide, not the hassle that they tend to be.

features.less: Less is more, enjoy your content as it should be experienced.
features.quiet: Quiet by default, you decide which emails you get notified about.
